testsuite.name: Scenario: Ensure a group is displayed in a Question's groups

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure a group is displayed in a Question's groups

testcase.name: And I am on the Content Repository page of Demonstration Class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure a group is displayed in a Question's groups

testcase.name: When I click "All Content Types" in the "Current Class" column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure a group is displayed in a Question's groups

testcase.name: And I click "Student Readiness" in the "All Content Types" column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure a group is displayed in a Question's groups

testcase.name: Then I see "Navigation" is visible in the "Student Readiness" column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure a group is displayed in a Question's groups

testcase.name: When I click on "Navigation" in the "Student Readiness" column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure a group is displayed in a Question's groups

testcase.name: Then I see that "Groups" header is visible in the navigation column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure a group is displayed in a Question's groups

testcase.name: And I see that "Student Readiness" Group is visible
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure a group is displayed in a Question's groups

testcase.name: classMethod
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure a group is displayed in a Question's groups
